jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: SELECT login, senha, 'true' as enable FROM usuario WHERE login=?
jdbc-user-service.authorities-by-username-query: select distinct * from ( (select u.login, gpp.permissao_id from usuario u join usuario_grupo_permissao usp on (u.id = usp.usuario_id) join grupo_permissao_permissao gpp on (gpp.permissao_grupo_id = usp.gruposPermissoes_ID) ) union (select u.login, up.permissao_id from usuario_permissao up join usuario u on up.usuario_id = u.id ) ) uni where uni.login=?
